constantValues: A line item attached to a Pledge, Payment Schedule, or Campaign indicating how associated payments should be designated.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: amountOfPledgeMaxBase

constantValues: Value of the Amount Of Pledge Max in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Amount Of Pledge Max in base currency.

members.name: perPaymentMaxAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Per Payment Max Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Per Payment Max Amount in base currency.

members.name: priorityOrder

constantValues: Applied when multiple line items might conflict (e.g. 90% vs $1000000)

members.description: Applied when multiple line items might conflict (e.g. 90% vs $1000000)

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'DesignationPlan' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Designation Plan

members.description: Reason for the status of the Designation Plan

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'DesignationPlan' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

foreignKeyAttribute.name: transactionCurrencyId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.

definitions.description: A line item attached to a Pledge, Payment Schedule, or Campaign indicating how associated payments should be designated.
